segments.text: it's hard to say . While dogs are more affectionate , cats are much easier to take care of .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: have you ever had a dog ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: when I was little , we had a few domestic dogs at home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: they always say that dogs are a man's best friends . do you think that's true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: definitely . rich or poor , dogs always love their masters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about cats ? Have you ever had one for a pet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: i had one a few months ago , but she ended up running away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: she left through a window that was open one night and never returned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: i was pretty sad . i still hope that she'll return some day !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope she does . Do you think you'll ever get another pet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I will . It's difficult to feel longly when you have a pet around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: i hope your cat finds its way back home .
segments.speaker: S1
